name: URIN_BLADDER_BIOPS
description: Stores single response data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76060: URINARY BLADDER: Biopsy.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: UROT_CCM_W_VAR_HIST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of Urothelial carcinoma with variant histology.

columns.name: SQM_C_CCNM_VAR_HIST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of Squamous cell carcinoma, variant histology.

columns.name: ADNCCNM_VAR_HIST
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of Adenocarcinoma, variant histology.

columns.name: UNDIFF_CCNM
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of undifferentiated carcinoma.

columns.name: HIST_TP_MIX_CT
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of mixed cell type.

columns.name: HISTO_TYPE_SPECIFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify histologic type.

columns.name: HG_URTL_CCNM_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade Urothelial Carcinoma.

columns.name: HG_URTL_CCNM_S
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the details of Histologic Grade Urothelial carcinoma.

columns.name: HG_ADEN_SQUA_CC_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Histologic Grade Adenocarcinoma and Squamous Cell Carcinoma.

columns.name: ADEN_SQUA_CCS
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Histologic Grade Adenocarcinoma and Squamous Cell Carcinoma.

columns.name: OTHER_TM_CONFIG_S
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other tumor configuration.

columns.name: AM_MUS_PROP_INV_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Determine Adequacy of Material for Muscularis Propria Invasion.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SPFY
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.
